document.masterDocTitle: A new species of the genus Anthaxia (Anthaxia) (Coleoptera: Buprestidae) from Republic of South Africa

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of the genus Anthaxia (Anthaxia) (Coleoptera: Buprestidae) from Republic of South Africa

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthaxia aterrima
Kerremans, 1903
: 172
, original description. Type locality: ‘Cap de Bonne-Espérance’ (Cape Province).
Anthaxia aterrima
Kerremans, 1914
: 350
, original description ( Congo ), junior homonym =
Anthaxia peratra , Obenberger, 1928
, nom. nov.

Anthaxia ( Anthaxia ) braunsi :
Obenberger, 1922
: 122
–123, syn. nov. Type locality: ‘Willowmore, Capland’.
